name: Vegan Breakfast Cookies
description: These Gluten-free Vegan Breakfast Cookies are satisfying with the oats, nuts, seeds. They are also gluten-free and have no added oil! Gluten-free flourless, wholesome, Soy-free Oil-free Recipe. No Bananas
recipeIngredient: 1  flax egg ((1 tbsp flax seed meal mixed in 2.5 tbsp water))
1 cup old fashioned oats (, certified gluten-free if needed. Or omit and add more of the seeds, nuts and coconut)
3 tbsp chocolate chips (plus 1 tbsp for topping or use dried fruit)

recipeInstructions.text: Make flax egg by mixing 1 tbsp flax seed meal with 2.5 tbsp warm water in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Make flax egg by mixing 1 tbsp flax seed meal with 2.5 tbsp warm water in a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the nut butter, maple syrup, and vanilla extract and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the nut butter, maple syrup, and vanilla extract and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the baking powder and salt into the almond flour. Add to the bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the baking powder and salt into the almond flour. Add to the bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oats, coconut, seeds, chocolate. Mix everything until well combined. Press and mix to evenly hydrate the dry ingredients. Chill for half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oats, coconut, seeds, chocolate. Mix everything until well combined. Press and mix to evenly hydrate the dry ingredients. Chill for half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 340 deg F (170 C). Scoop and place on parchment lined baking sheet. Press to shape into flat cookies. Press chocolate chips on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 340 deg F (170 C). Scoop and place on parchment lined baking sheet. Press to shape into flat cookies. Press chocolate chips on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 18 to 20 mins. Cool completely then store on the counter in a covered container for the week. Refrigerate for a few weeks. Freeze for upto 2 months.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 18 to 20 mins. Cool completely then store on the counter in a covered container for the week. Refrigerate for a few weeks. Freeze for upto 2 months.

keywords: everything cookie, gluten free vegan breakfast cookies
